name: Bladewind
description:
Bladewind is a 3rd person action rogue-like with a fun arcade twist coming to PC. The art style has a fantastical medieval feel with striking characters and environments. As the player, you get to select one of three classes, each with their own set of unique abilities. The player must then utilise these abilities and gear up with random weapons bought in the hub in order to fight waves of enemies, defeating bosses and searching for treasure along the way within the different levels.

Control Keys

WASD -  Movement.

Shift - Sprint.

T - Opens the task window.

Control - Character Special Ability

F - Picks Up Weapon.

G - Drops Weapon.
